import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Icon, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' const AddTask = () => { const [firstOpen, setFirstOpen] = React.useState(false) const [secondOpen, setSecondOpen] = React.useState(false) const [task, setTask] = useState('') const [toTime, setToTime] = useState('') const [fromTime, setFromTime] = useState('') const [priority, setPriority] = useState('low') const onTaskChange = e => { console.log(task) setTask(e.target.value) } const onPriorityChange = e => {} const onFromTimeChange = (e) => { setFromTime(e.target.value) } const onToTimeChange = (e) => { setToTime(e.target.value) } const onFormSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() } const newTaskAdded = () => { setFirstOpen(true) setSecondOpen(true) setTimeout(() => { setSecondOpen(false) setFirstOpen(false) }, 2000) } return ( //
//
Add New Task
//
//

//
//
//
Approve
//
Neutral
//
Cancel
//
//
<> setFirstOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setFirstOpen(true)} open={firstOpen} > Add New Task
To
Priority
{/* */} {/* */}
{/* Task
Time
Priority
*/}
setSecondOpen(false)} open={secondOpen} size="small" >

Task added successfully!

 ) } export default AddTask
